Talks

In addition to my official teaching and research duties, I have been interested in giving online training courses since COVID pandemic. These efforts turned to be a permanent habit and I shared my experiences with interested people regularly. Besides, in an irregular setting, happy to share some short mediums for different topics and ideas.

Generative AI

  • Beyond using LLM interfaces: Backstage exploration
    Centre for Data, Culture and Society Summer School. A Gentle Introduction to Coding for Data Analysis Stream, June 2024.

  • Efficient Prompting for Generative AI Tools
    Centre for Data, Culture and Society Summer School, January 2024.

  • Talking with your data: Langchain use case
    University of Edinburgh, School of Mathematics, ML Reading Group, December 2023.

  • Harnessing Gen-AI for teaching/research
    Directed Reading Program (DRP2023) - Professional Development Talks, July 2023.
